name: TANKS! Redux
description:
TANKS! Redux is a Round-Based Multiplayer Tank Shooter that pits two players against one another in tactical tank combat! Navigating a delapidated oil drilling facility, track your enemy, collect gems to stay in the fight, take your shot and beat the clock to win!

TANKS! Redux features:

  • A large, open level design densely filled with structures and foliage
  • Health and Shield Pickups for increased health pool
  • A round timer to set the pace of the fight
